    "price.euros": {
      type: "double",
      script: {
        source:
          "\n          emit(doc['price'].value * params.conversion_rate)\n        ",
        params: {
          conversion_rate: 0.835526591,
        },
      },
    },
  },
  aggs: {
    price_ranges: {
      range: {
        field: "price.euros",

          {
            to: 100,
          },

            from: 100,
            to: 200,
